This is episode 19 of the one bedroom series (see link below for all episodes). In this video, I continued where we shopped on the roof plan by adding additional roof framing elements (such as rafters and fascia board) as well as annotation and details. 

I hope that you learn a thing or 3. Do me a favour - do one of the below...
